pools.name: SupportXMR

pools.name: MineXMR
pools.description: Well-established pool with good hashrate distribution and reliable payouts.

pools.name: MoneroOcean
pools.description: Popular pool with very low minimum payout and automatic coin switching.

pools.name: P2Pool
pools.description: Decentralized pool that eliminates the need for centralized mining pools.

pools.name: Nanopool
pools.description: Established multi-currency pool with higher minimum payout threshold.

pools.name: HashVault
pools.description: Reliable pool with competitive fees and good performance.

notes.fee_comparison: Lower fees = higher earnings, but consider reliability and features
notes.min_payout: Lower minimum payout = more frequent but smaller payments

pool_type.PPLNS: Pay Per Last N Shares - pays based on shares in last N minutes
pool_type.PPS: Pay Per Share - pays fixed amount per share, higher fees

recommendations.beginners: SupportXMR or MineXMR - good balance of fees and reliability
